summary: Implement automated load testing that runs on every PR to stress-test the system and uncover bugs that integration tests miss. Testing should include cloud deployment scenarios to validate address and TLS options.
userImpact: Automated load testing will catch bugs early in the development cycle before they reach users in production.
proposedFix: Set up benchmark tests to run on every PR, including scenarios testing cloud deployment with address and TLS options
resolutionDetails: Automated load testing feature was implemented and integrated into the CI/PR workflow
keyQuote: The simple bench test stresses the system uncovering bugs that integration tests tend to miss.
